abstract: Attackers kill 12 people, including two Filipinos and two Ghanaians, at Libya's Mabruk oil field; Islamic State militants claim responsibility.
lead_paragraph: Filipino officials said three of its citizens were among seven foreigners abducted at the remote Mabruk field.

headline.main: 12 Are Killed in Attack on Libyan Oil Field
headline.print_headline: 12 Are Killed in Attack on Libyan Oil Field

snippet: Filipino officials said three of its citizens were among seven foreigners abducted at the remote Mabruk field.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
